title: Rebind centered hub logo image (remove + reinsert) without layout changes

requirements.text: Perform an asset rebinding step for the centered hub logo image by forcing the hub logo element to be removed from the DOM and reinserted, while continuing to load ONLY from the exact filename "/logo2-1.png". This must not change any layout, sizing, positioning, z-index, halo ring styling, or any other visual styling.

quotes:
Please remove and reinsert the hub logo image.

Use:
logo2-1.png

This is an asset rebinding step.
Do not change layout or styling.

acceptanceCriteria: The centered hub logo still references only src "/logo2-1.png" and does not introduce any references to "/logo2.png" or other filenames.
There is an explicit, deterministic code path that unmounts and remounts the hub logo image element (remove + reinsert) to rebind the asset.
No visual/layout/styling changes occur to the hub logo or halo ring: same size, same centering, same z-index layering, same shadows/filters, same pointer-events behavior.
Existing asset validation, Asset Scan Results gating, and missing-asset enforcement behavior remains unchanged.

constraints: Do not change the hub logo layout or styling; this change must be asset rebinding only.
Continue to use the exact filename "/logo2-1.png" for the centered hub logo.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Changing the theatre scene visuals, controls UI, or any other assets.
Adding new image assets or substituting placeholder images.
